title: Ich tr√§umte von Afrika.
description: At the age of 25, Kuki Gallmann moved to Kenya with her future husband, where they established a vast ranch. But Africa's beauty does't come without a price, and when tragedy struck, Kuki found herself pregnant and alone, with her young son and 90,000 acres of Africa to oversee. 32 pages of photos, half in full colour.
author: Kuki Gallmann
